text:
Thomas Ludwig John D'Alesandro III (July 24, 1929 – October 20, 2019) was an American attorney and politician. He was Mayor of Baltimore, Maryland from 1967 to 1971.
He was the brother of Speaker of the U.S. House of Representatives Nancy Pelosi, and son of former Baltimore Mayor Thomas D'Alesandro Jr., who served from 1947 to 1959.
D'Alesandro III died at his home in Baltimore from stroke-related problems on October 20, 2019 at the age of 90.

annotations.surface_form: Speaker of the U.S. House of Representatives
